item.title: JQuery learning as beginner（English）学习笔记
item.description:
JQuery learning note

jQuery is a JavaScript Library. jQuery greatly simplifies JavaScript programming, very easy to learn. Let’s start our journey. ❤❤

copy this link:
https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.min.js

new a index.html, insert

1. Selectors

new a html with basic element

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>jQuery | Selcetors</title>
    <script src=" https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.min.js"></script>
    <style>
      body {
        font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif;

        line-height: 1.5em;
      }
      header {
        background: #333;
        color: #fff;
        padding: 20px;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 4px #000 solid;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
      }
      #container {
        width: 90%;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 10px;
      }
    </style>
    <link
      href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:ital,wght@1,300&display=swap"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
  </head>
  <body>
    <header>
      <h1>jQuery Learning</h1>
    </header>
    <div id="container">
      <h1 id="heading1">Heading One</h1>
      <p id="para1">
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quidem
        veritatis iusto mollitia nemo accusantium asperiores aliquam
        necessitatibus minus blanditiis hic aliquid sint dolorum, inventore
        nostrum expedita, velit, illum voluptates error dignissimos.<span
          >Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
          Exercitationem, omnis?
        </span>
        Consequuntur itaque sequi doloremque, perspiciatis, voluptatem harum
        minima consequatur officiis laudantium animi consectetur recusandae
        deleniti provident, sint iure. Consequatur.
      </p>
      <h1 class="heading2">Heading Two</h1>
      <p class="para2">
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Quidem
        veritatis iusto mollitia nemo accusantium asperiores aliquam
        necessitatibus minus blanditiis hic aliquid sint dolorum, inventore
        nostrum expedita, velit, illum voluptates error dignissimos.<span
          >Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
          Exercitationem, omnis?
        </span>
        Consequuntur itaque sequi doloremque, perspiciatis, voluptatem harum
        minima consequatur officiis laudantium animi consectetur recusandae
        deleniti provident, sint iure. Consequatur.
      </p>
      <ul id="list">
        <li>List Item</li>
        <li>List Item</li>
        <li>List Item</li>
        <li>List Item</li>
        <li>List Item</li>
        <li>List Item</li>
      </ul>

      <input type="button" value="Button 1" />
      <input type="submit" value="submit" />
      <input type="text" />
      <a href="http://google.com">Goole</a>
      <a href="http://bing.com">Bing</a>
    </div>
    <!-- ❤❤❤❤ try everyline of codes below, including the lines with // 下面属于基本的选择方法。-->
    <script>
      // $("h1").hide();
      // $("h1#heading1").hide();
      // $("h1.heading2").hide();
      // $(".heading2").hide();
      $("p span").css("color", "orange"); // span is inside the p
      $("ul#list li:first").css("color", "red");
      $("ul#list li:last").css("color", "blue");
      $("ul#list li:even").css("background-color", "pink");
      $("ul#list li:nth-child(3)").css("list-style", "none");
      $("ul#list li:nth-child(2n)").css("list-style", "none"); //2n= 2, 4, 6
      $(":submit").hide();
      $("[href]").css("color", "green");
      $('a[href="http://google.com"]').css("color", "purple");
      // $("*").hide();
    </script>
  </body
</html>

again. try every single line between <scipty> </scripty, you will notice $( ) is used to select elements.

2. Events

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>jQuery | Selcetors</title>
    <script src=" https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.5.1.min.js"></script>
    <style>
      body {
        font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif;

        line-height: 1.5em;
      }
      header {
        background: #333;
        color: #fff;
        padding: 20px;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 4px #000 solid;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
      }
      #container {
        width: 90%;
        margin: auto;
        padding: 10px;
      }
    </style>
    <link
      href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:ital,wght@1,300&display=swap"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
  </head>
  <body>
    <header>
      <h1>jQuery Learning</h1>
    </header>
    <div id="container">
      <h3>House Events</h3>
      <button id="btn1">Button 1</button>
      <button id="btn2">Button 2</button>
      <p class="para1">
        Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nostrum
        praesentium voluptatibus, pariatur officia consequatur dicta quos
        tempore blanditiis quo molestias!
      </p>
      <h1 id="coords"></h1>
      <hr />
      <form id="form">
        <label>Name</label><br />
        <input type="text" id="name" name="name" />
        <br />
        <label>Email</label><br />
        <input type="email" id="email" name="email" />
        <br />
        <label>Gender</label><br />
        <select name="gender" id="gender">
          <option value="male">Male</option>
          <option value="female">Female</option>
        </select>
        <br />
        <input type="submit" value="submit" />
      </form>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>

here is the fun part~~~

<script>
 $(document).ready(function(){ // this line is not required, but a good pratice这行非必须

       $("#btn1").click( () => alert('Button Clicked!'));

      //  $("#btn1").on("click", function(){
      //     alert("Button Clicked");
      //     })



      // button click
       $("#btn1").on("click", function(){
                $(".para1").hide();
               });
       $("#btn2").on("click", function(){
                $(".para1").show();
               });

      //when we need to use one button to hide and show the text

       $("#btn1").on("click", function(){
                $(".para1").toggle();
                });

      // double click
       $("#btn1").dblclick(function(){
                $(".para1").toggle();
                });

     // hover, !important : hover cannot use $().on("hover", function())..
    // but you can use "mouceenter" and "mouceleave" to do that
    $("#btn1").hover(function(){
               $(".para1").toggle();
               });

    //
    $("#btn1").click(function(e){
                  // console.log(e);
                  // console.log(e.currentTarget);
                  // alert(e.currentTarget.id);
                  // alert(e.currentTarget.innerHTML);
                  // alert(e.currentTarget.outerHTML);
                  // alert(e.currentTarget.className);
    });

   //postion
   $("#btn1").on("mousemove", function(e){
              //     console.log('Coords: Y: '+e.clientY+' X: '+e.clientX);

              // });
              // $(document).on("mousemove", function(e){
              //     console.log('Coords: Y: '+e.clientY+' X: '+e.clientX);
   });

  //focus
  $("input").focus(function(){
                 //alert("Focus");
                 //$("input#name").css("background", "yellow");
                 //
                 $(this).css("background", "blue");
  });

  $("input").blur(function(){
                 //alert("Focus");
                 //$("input#name").css("background", "yellow");
                 //
                 $(this).css("background", "yellow");
  });

   $("input").keyup(function(){
                 //alert("Focus");
                 //$("input#name").css("background", "yellow");
                 //
                 console.log("keyup");
   });

   $("input").keyup(function(e){
                 //alert("Focus");
                 //$("input#name").css("background", "yellow");
                 //
                 console.log(e.target.value);
  });

  //selector
   $("select#gender").change(function(){
             alert("changed");
    });
    $("select#gender").change(function(e){
                 alert(e.target.value);
    })

  //form

  $("#form").submit(function(){
          console.log("submitted");
   }) // nothing happen on my web, it is said submitting. So try to use codes below, add e.preventDefault

  $("#form").submit(function(e){
          e.preventDefault();
          var name = $("input#name").val();
          console.log(name);
   })

});

    </script>

</body
</html>
